title: Ndenge Esalaka - Temple Orbital
heading: Ndenge Esalaka
intro: Projet ya Temple Orbital ezali na ba éléments misato oyo ekangisami oyo esalaka elongo mpo na kotinda bankombo na tempelo na espace.
paragraph1: Satellite yango ebalukaka zingazinga ya Mabelé na bosanda ya kilomɛtrɛ soki 525, mpe ebombaka bankombo yango na mémoire na yango. Ba stations terrestres esololaka na satellite na tango ya ba passes na yango, etindaka ba kombo oyo bato batindi na nzela ya site internet.
paragraph2: Tango otindi kombo, ekosangana na molongo mpe ekotindama na satellite na tango ya passe oyo ekolanda oyo ezali. Okozwa bondimisi ya email ntango nkombo na yo esili kozala na malonga na Tempelo ya Orbital.
imageAlt: Diagramme ya Système ya Temple Orbital
